meanings.definition: A compound containing two vinyl groups.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the divinyl under the microscope.
meanings.sent2: The divinyl is an important component in many chemical reactions.
meanings.sent3: The divinyl walked into the lab and caused quite a stir.
meanings.sent4: Her passion for chemistry was like a divinyl, binding her to the world of science.
meanings.sent5: The divinyl compound sparkled under the fluorescent lights of the lab.

meanings.definition: A type of resin used in the production of plastics.
meanings.sent1: The factory workers poured the divinyl into molds to create plastic products.
meanings.sent2: Divinyl is known for its durability and versatility in manufacturing.
meanings.sent3: The divinyl resin decided to take a vacation from the factory and explore the world.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity flowed like divinyl, molding ideas into tangible products.
meanings.sent5: The scent of divinyl resin filled the air as the plastic products cooled.
